title: Diamond Vanki Pendant - "Vajra Tilakam"
materials: 18k Rose Gold with Certified Natural Diamonds (Color: G-H
Clarity: VS). High-polish finish for enduring brilliance.
features: Contemporary adaptation of the traditional 'Vanki' design, featuring a delicate lattice-work setting of brilliant-cut diamonds. The central diamond is meticulously prong-set for maximum sparkle. The design is inspired by the serpent hood motif, reimagined with a modern aesthetic.
colors: Warm rose gold complemented by the dazzling white of the diamonds
occasions: Perfect for adding a touch of modern elegance to everyday wear
or as a sophisticated statement piece for cocktail parties and formal gatherings. Its unique design makes it a thoughtful gift for special occasions.
